=====
Usage
=====

To use arosics in a project::

    import arosics


Command line utilities
**********************

arosics_cli.py
-----------

At the command line, arosics provides the **arosics_cli.py** command:

.. argparse::
   :filename: ./../bin/arosics_cli.py
   :func: get_arosics_argparser
   :prog: arosics_cli.py
